content:
**note ** you need to register to access the free patterns at the freepatterns com website also available at free-crochet 1 1 http //www free-crochet com/search html criteria=fc00239 pattern at crochethook here 2 2 http //www angelfire com/oh/crochethook/olde/lagoon html
**materials ** size 30 crochet thread * 1 ball white mc * 1 ball robinette or color of choice cc * milwards steel crochet hook no 10
